name: grumpycat
description: Slack bot with some simple utilities

SLACK_API_TOKEN.description: API token for Slack Bot Integration API (http://slack.com/services)

ADMIN_USERS.description: Comma-delimited list of users to make permanent (un-demotable) admins.

BANNED_USERS.description: Comma-delimited list of users to make permanently (non-unbannable) banned.
